properties.orebody_fm: OTHER (>100 MINERALIZED VIENS AND SHEAR ZONES OVER AN AREA 1 X 1.5KM IN SIZE)
properties.ore_ctrl: Mineralized Veins, Shear Zones, And Brecciated Areas
properties.tectonic: Palau Arc Is An Intra-Oceanic Island Arc-Trench System Separating The Pacific And Philippine Plates In The Western Pacific Ocean.  It Is The Southernmost Of A Series Of Arc-Trench Systems (Including Yap, Mariana, And Bonin-Izu Systems).
properties.ref: MILLER, W.R., RYTUBA, J.J., ARNOLD, M.A., AND VERCOUTERE, T.L., 1989, INVESTIGATION OF THE ROIS MALK EPITHERMAL GOLD SYSTEM, REPUBLIC OF PALAU: U.S. GEOLOGICAL SURVEY BULLETIN 1872, 85P. PLUS 3 PLATES.RYTUBA, J.J., MILLER, W.R., AND STEWART, J.H., 1985, ROIS MALK EPITHERMAL GOLD SYSTEM, REPUBLIC OF PALAU: U.S. GEOLOGICAL SURVEY OPEN-FILE REPORT 85-606, 6P.RYTUBA, J.J., MILLER, W.R., AND MCKEE E.H., 1987, EPITHERMAL GOLD MINERALIZATION IN THE REPUBLIC OF PALAU: IN U.S. GEOLOGICAL SURVEY CIRCULAR 995 (MCKELVEY FORUM ABSTRACTS, 1987), P. 59-60.USGS BULLETIN 1872 (1989USGS BULLETIN 1872 (1989)
properties.discr: This Area Was Previously Prospected By The Japanese, But In 1938-39 Was Considered To Be Of No Commercial Interest.
